Tag_Imageneed.description: ''[[The Fate of Atlantis | Assassin's Creed: Odyssey — The Fate of Atlantis]]''

MemoryInfobox.appearance: 'Assassin's Creed: Odyssey' - 'The Fate of Atlantis: Torment of Hades'
MemoryInfobox.location: Echoes of the Styx, Chasm of Torment, the Underworld

General_Description: '''Round and Round''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Riddle: ''[[Kronos]] and the [[Titan]]s ruled all before their fall was prophesized. They were overthrown by the [[Twelve Gods|Olympians]], and were doomed to reside in the deepest abyss of [[Tartaros]] forever. Move fom the [[Echoes of the Styx|Echoes]] to the western Altars that represent the twelve members, and find me below the arc.''
Section_Trivia: *The name of the riddle is also the name of one of the [[Glyphs#Glyph Puzzles|Glyphs]] left behind by [[Clay Kaczmarek]].
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]'' - ''[[The Fate of Atlantis: Torment of Hades]]''
